# NSApplication.ActivationOptions

**Structure**

The following flags are for [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSRunningApplication/activate(options:)].

## Declaration

```swift
struct ActivationOptions
```

## Options

- **activateAllWindows**: By default, activation brings only the main and key windows forward.  If you specify NSApplicationActivateAllWindows, all of the application’s windows are brought forward.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Initializes a new activation options structure.

## Deprecated

- **activateIgnoringOtherApps**: The application is activated regardless of the currently active app.

## Activating and deactivating the app

- **Passing control from one app to another with cooperative activation**: Request focus for your app, and coordinate passing control from one app to another.
- **activate()**: Activates the receiver app, if appropriate.
- **deactivate()**: Deactivates the receiver.
- **isActive**: A Boolean value indicating whether this is the active app.
- **yieldActivation(to:)**: Explicitly allows another app to make itself active.
- **yieldActivation(toApplicationWithBundleIdentifier:)**: Explicitly allows another app to make itself active.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
